But I promised you guys a specific stream for when we hit 30,000. So I will grab the link to that because I'm also going to do a giveaway for the when we do hit it. So there will be a specific stream and then also going to offer to connect with somebody and essentially have a one on one with them, which I offer limited availability for that for like a really small number of people. But every once in a while, I like to just connect with somebody random and you know, see what we can, what we can do. So we are on our way almost there. As always, if you need anything, just hit your boy up. Be an outlier. Be a little later.
